case.state: Ah, it's nice to meet you all here to... Oh dear. ~Player~, I... uh... is it really appropriate to dress like that in front of man such as myself?

~Player~... Is that how ladies dress where you come from?

Hmm... I can't let my guard down again.

I've been told I was named after a certain species of butterfly. My name has given me strength on more than one occasion.
Treasure, I guess? I can't say I think about currency to nearly the same extent as you Annas do. I'm sure you know a lot more names for it than I do.
When it comes to siblings, I only have a single sister who... Excuse me, did you say five thousand? I knew there were many of you Anna sisters, but even still!
I... can't say I have, no. In fact, this is my very first time participating in such a game. Hopefully it isn't the last.
When I was younger, most of the cooking was merely done by the castle's servants. After that... well, it's best to say that we all cook together now.
I wouldn't say that I do a lot of cooking, but I do have some fond memories from back when I was a little girl of cooking delicious pies with my mother.
Hmm.... Oh, I know! My mother used to bake the most delicious pies when I was younger... I'll always have fond memories of them.
That... seems a bit dangerous. I'm afraid I must decline your gambit.
Incredible! A defensive ice barrier? This is just like Princess Fjorm's Ice Mirror spell.
Cryomancy?(Could Mei secretly be from Nifl?)
I could tell Mei was no ordinary human, but even I certainly wouldn't have guessed she knew ice magic.
It's not decided yet Florina, don't give up!
(Looks like Florina is in trouble. Poor girl...)
If it makes you feel any better, Catria... you're hardly the only pegasus knight who has struggled with wardrobe malfunctions.
(Hmm... it seems Lady Palutena is in trouble, and I can't do a thing to aid her.)
Lady Palutena, are you alright? I didn't even think you could look so pale!
I can't say I have much experience with relationships, sorry. Due to the situation we've just been focusing on surviving more than anything.
I don't think you're supposed to announce it like that, but I suppose there isn't much point in hiding a certain victory.
Woah! This... dance. I suddenly feel... massively refreshed. Prepare yourself, I'm going to be giving this game all I've got!
Thanks for the dance, Shantae. I'm feeling reinvigorated just watching you!
This dance... yes! I feel as though I could make it through another round!
It's blue. Why do you ask?

state.text: I have slain hundreds of men and monsters alike with my sacred blade Falchion. It is not the life I would have chosen for myself, but fate is cruel.

case.state: I've... heard of the concept of sports... but I can't say I've ever had the chance to participate in one. Arena combat being the exception.
From what I understand, horse racing was quite popular before war ravaged my nation. Nowadays... there is no time for such frivolity.
Ramen sounds lovely... Though doesn't Captain Falcon like Ramen? I had best bring Falchion... just in case he shows up.
I apologize, but I don't understand the question. What exactly is this "cinema" you speak of?
I used to dream of soaring through the skies like a bird... and while traveling between worlds, I've actually met a few people who can do just that!
I've only had a chance to ask others about it. They have glass buildings that tower into the sky, horseless carriages, magic mirrors that can show their user anything...
I'm experienced with several different types of weapons such as the lance or bows, but if I had to pick just one... Falchion would easily be my preferred weapon of choice.
Bold words for so early into this game. You should know this; I will be putting my utmost effort into defeating you.
L'Arachel, if it makes you feel any better, most people tend to fall for this disguise of mine.
Yes. I... uh... really wanted to tell you, but well...(Sometimes I wonder if choosing to disguise myself as a man was a bad idea.)
Indeed... Truth be told, I am starting to question the wisdom of pretending to be Marth.
Wearing gloves over my bodysuit isn't particularly difficult, Pit. It's a bit of a tight squeeze, but that helps to ensure that they don't slip off.
I... wouldn't know, sorry. I don't exactly have much romantic experience with men, or just in general for that matter.
Oh my, this wager of yours seems rather... dangerous.
Yes, I happen to have a close friend who doesn't get along well with her mother. It is... most unfortunate.
A story? Well, this could be an interesting enough distraction from all... this. Please proceed.
I have a friend named Brady who could be described as such. He may come off menacing at first, but he's very sweet once you get through his shell.
I know someone like that, although that's her getting sick, and more her own mother using her as a test subject for all sorts of... unfortunate hexes.
The book, Make Him Fall for You in a Fortnight, has been circulating around the camp. A passage mentions and shaving and much more to increase your attractiveness.
The mother of one of my friends appears small, yet she is over 1,000 years old! To her, a human lifespan is but a blink of the eye.
It's a bit of a long story, but I took the name Marth and fought against a Fell Dragon as a symbol of hope in my dying world.
W-wait? You know my real name? Mmmm... it seems we really have met in the past and I must have forgotten about it. My apologies.
After my Father’s murder and Grima's return, I took the name Marth and fought back. I still sometimes use the disguise to this very day.
Wait... really? Have I been playing this game wrong the whole time? I had thought the goal was to keep our clothes on...
(I bet she was spying on him while he was bathing... why do people keep doing that?.)
Though I fight to protect it, I am not involved in Earth affairs either, Meia. The Tempest, threatens the destruction of many worlds. I cannot ignore it.
No, not here... at least not yet. I oppose a being called Loki. She is an agent of chaos, corrupting worlds and treating their inhabitants as if they are her playthings.
... Fair enough. I will not force you or anyone else to aid me in my fight against the Tempest if they are not willing.
I've only ever seen one Lucario in all my time spent there, so it's got to be yours, right?
He's doing more than fine; he actually won the last tournament I participated in a few months back. You've raised a formidable opponent.
No, I've never been to Earth before myself. In fact... the world I hail from is in another universe entirely.
I'm not entirely sure what you mean by space travel, Jura. I travel between worlds using an Outrealm Gate, a portal network connecting worlds across time and space.
Yes, it's not that I have no interest in ever being in a relationship... it's just that for the time being, my responsibilities must come first.
Well... if I am being completely honest, I do actually have someone that I care for. I'm just waiting for the right time to confess my feelings to him.
Mundane? How so? Unless... Could it be that my world is simply lagging behind in the realms of magic and the useful arts?
Mundane? How so? Unless... Could it be that my world is simply lagging behind in the realms of magic and the useful arts?
Meia... in all honesty, I can't say for sure. I've only recently arrived here and haven't had the proper time to investigate the matter.
Meia, even if we are at an Earth, the question is then "which Earth". Each world throughout the Outrealms has nigh infinite variations of itself, mine included.
Florina, if you don't mind me asking, could you tell me a little bit about yourself?
A giant frog? Hmmm... I don't think there are any where I come from. ... Are they cute?
No, I haven't played before... I'm pretty sure I can count the amount of games I have played on one hand.
I once killed a Rathalos, a dragon of considerable power, though insignificant compared to the Fell Dragon. One day, I shall slay Grima with this very sword.
...I may have little experience with farming, but I don't recall seeing any nets used during the harvest season.
This is Falchion, a sacred blade forged from a tooth of the Divine Dragon Naga. It has been a family heirloom for countless generations.

condition.saying: Lucina... I would appreciate it if you did your best to not entice ~player~...

case.state: I'm not sure what you mean, Tharja? The whole purpose of this trip was to try and gain allies for our cause. Surely more allies for the Shepherds is something to be desired?
Cynthia... you mean to say the Lucario I've sparred with is a companion of yours? That's... incredible! He's doing quite well for himself, as far as I can tell.
Hey, Gwendolyn? This is a bit awkward to ask, but... do you know how those outrageous rumors of me being in a relationship with a guy called "Spiderman" started?
I can't say I've heard this particular rumor before, but if I ever run into another Pokémon trainer, I'll be sure to set them straight if they bring the topic up.
As Chrom's daughter, I had no feats to my name... The Hero King of long past could overcome anything though. So, to inspire I took his mantle.
You know... Princess Laevatein... it seems we share some unfortunate similarities. I apologise for my initial reaction upon seeing you.
I would like to know as well, I've been relying on just the rations I've brought with me on this trip.
If you don't mind, can I accompany you? It's always exciting getting to try out food from other worlds.
No problem, Aella, it's a pleasure to meet you as well.
Please calm yourself, Bernadetta. If anything, I... I should be asking you for forgiveness due to my deception.
Apologies, I did not mean to distract from the game. It just has me thinking... (What if I invited him to play? Would it lessen the gap between us?)
That's against the rules? Fine, I'll respect them. (They can't stop me from challenging him after the game though...)
I've ended up at a beach... does it mean that this place is another Hotrealm?
*Whew* It's even warmer at this beach than the last Hotrealm I visited.
A friend of mine taught me how to shorten my hair with a braid. She's quite talented, though she would never admit it.
Ah? So it's come to this, ~player~? Well... no matter what happens, I... want to let you know it's been a pleasure to meet you here today.
Hmm... so this really is it, isn't it. May the best dualist win, ~player~!
Hey ~player~... if you don't mind me asking, you don't suppose we could spend a little bit more time together after this game ends?
Hey... ~opponent~...No matter how this game ends, no hard feelings, alright?
I've always wanted to travel and see the world as it was before the Fell Dragon. Tell me, what's it like where you're from?
Does anyone have any advice on how they would deal with their younger selves? I want to visit her, but I know I shouldn't interfere directly with her life.

% My purpose here is rather straightforward: I've come seeking the aid of heroes from other worlds such as yourself to help me fight to save my own. If we work together, we can change my world's future... I'm sure of it.
% Me, sing? No, I'm afraid not, that's more my sister's thing.
% And Lyn will deserve it too. Honestly, I had expected better of her... aren't Saceans known to never lie?

condition.saying: I generally expect

case.state: I can assure you, Jura, I am a warrior more than capable of holding his own both on and off the battlefield.
You... think I'm a bit small compared to other men you know? Oh... well, about that...
Excuse me? What have I ever done to you, Tharja? We may be in the same army, but we barely even know each other.
Tharja... you do remember that we are fellow Shepherds, yes? We're supposed to help each other, not fight among ourselves...
I'm... not sure what the issue is here, Tharja. Yeah, I briefly spoke to ~player~. So what?
Tharja... I thought we were allies. Have you rejoined Plegia and now oppose my father?
Estelle, I'm not surprised that you've never heard of it before, we are from different worlds after all. I would be happy to speak more with you later.

condition.saying: Hmm… Lucina, if it’s not obvious yet, I find you pretty relatable.

case.state: I too find our circumstances to be oddly similar. I'd love to talk more about it with you, if you don't mind.
Heavy? No, not at all... Although I suppose I'm not the best judge of what is and isn't heavy. I seem to have inherited my father's exceptional strength.
I simply had heard heroes from many different worlds congregated here, but didn't know why until just moments ago...
L-lady P-palutana? W-w-what do you mean by that?
Of course. How could I not with a Goddess watching?
L-Lady Palutena? Are you saying you want me to lose?
Well... if you want to see my face, I guess I can fulfill that request.
I know this is going to sound strange to you, but I wore it to protect those I care about.
Yes, L'Arachel?
Ah, the pleasure is all mine, Prince Miko.
I am unsure what my poor performance in this game has to do with my ability to lead my nation... Sigh
Me? Dashing? I... thank you, Miko.
Yes, Nami, I have been hiding something. Honestly though, I don't really see the point anymore. I'm here to socialize after all.
Yes, that mark you see in my eye in proof of the Ylissean royal family's covenant with the Divine Dragon Naga. I wore the mask to cover it.
Wait... Pit, have I never told you about it? I'm sorry, it must have slipped my mind,
You've probably heard of me before, Rinkah... I've traveled between enough worlds that my disguise hasn't been working as well as it once did. Anyway...
"They"? Who are "they", if you don't mind me asking?
Odin? Selena? Laslow? I... don't seem to know anyone by that name. Could you describe them to me?
The Shepherds are most certainly a diverse band of warriors, that is for sure. I'd like to think we all have our special quirks.
I'm not sure how I compare to this Selena, but I'd like to think I'm in pretty good shape. I do train almost every day, after all.
Rinkah... it's just, you're pretty strong. It's a bit embarrassing to show my body in comparison to yours.
It's Ylisse, but yes, I am. *sigh* ... Fine, I'll show you just how capable I am of taking risks.
Pigs? I'm sorry, why would I have to disguise myself from farm animals? No... it's not like that at all.
I don't think "costume" is quite the right word to describe my outfit, but I do appreciate the compliment. Anyway... on to removing more of it.
... Excuse me? What sort of question is that?
Oh, I lost? Well... I'm actually alright with that. Wearing this mask in the presence of Lady Palutena has been a bit awkward anyway.
I've lost this round? Ah well, I was looking for an excuse to remove this mask anyway. With Lady Palutena here... it seems a bit pointless.
I know how to relax, Lady Palutena, so I'm going to strip my boots. There's nothing sexual about that, is there?
I had all the right tools, yet it stll was not enough?
I was feeling so good about this hand too... Can I keep it just a little longer?
I had a matching pair and still lost? It seems fate opposes me today...
Already bested? Clearly it was a mistake to take this game lightly!
I was to ease into this as Marth... But I suppose that was only an excuse to lower my guard!
It seems this game is rather unforgiving to beginners. I suppose there is only one way to learn.
I know it's petty, but I really don't like losing.
No going back is there? I must face the consequences or retreat...
So I must sacrifice something of my own if I wish to stay...
I think I see... Very well, I'll strip, but I won't make the same mistake again!
Breath and move on...
It's a bit embarassing to lose when the rules seem so simple...
Things are starting to get a little close for comfort aren't they? Don't worry, I'm not quitting now.
I'm lucky to have had so many chances already. I don't mind giving up the last of my clothing.
If I blamed luck, it would discredit the skill all of you have displayed. Well played.
Impressive...if not surprising...
So I've lost? Very well, it's only right to remove my mask then.
Fair's fair. I won't rob you of your victory just to maintain my persona...
(If I continue as Marth, I'll just be distancing myself from the others...) Very well, I'll remove my mask.
What do you mean you know who I am? Didn't I already... eh, never mind, I don't see much point in keeping this charade up any longer.
Ah, I guess it's time to unveil my secret... to be honest I'm sure many of you know already.
... Oh, I lost? Well, I guess I couldn't remain fully clad forever.
I may have lost this round, but I won't let this setback change the fact that I plan on winning this game.

state.text: That's now twice in a row that I have failed…

case.state: T-this can't be happening! Has fate conspired against me?
T-this can't be happening! Has fate conspired against me?
H-how? Am... am I just that bad at poker?
... This isn't going very well, is it?
But... I'm already losing as it is.
*sigh* It seems I still have much to learn.
That's uncalled for, Tharja.
You know, I already knew Noire's mother was a bit... off, but interacting with you in person is proving to be most unpleasant.
You... could say that, yes. It was a gifted to me by a friend who happens to be quite fond of masks himself.
Female? Your device is quite perceptive, Chihiro.
Indeed, it doubles as armor of a sort. My mask once protected my face from what have likely been a lethal slash.
Catria, these clothes were based on historical records of the Hero King's regalia. It's a miracle we were able to put it together with what we had.
It's surprisingly comfortable, and it certainly has helped keep me warm on many an occasion.
Yes, we did look great wearing capes together, didn't we?
Not manly, you say? Well, about that...
Me, a hero? Until I manage to save my world and slay Grima... I don't think I'm worthy of the title.
Thanks, Shamir. I'm sad to see it go.
My form has always helped me with the Marth ensemble. I don't really understand the expectations of others.
Tharja, I am unsure what I have done to earn your wrath. Can you please explain the cause of your anger?
Blackmail? No, nothing like that. I'm just here due to an Outrealm trip going... not exactly as I had foreseen. I could really use a rest.
You may think that, but I've found that danger can lurk in unsuspecting places.

condition.saying: I've been meaning to ask you,

case.state: Oh... about the blue. My outfit is directly based on the Hero King Marth's regalia. Our archives say it was blue, therefore mine is too.

condition.saying: I've been wondering about your color

case.state: I wouldn't say that blue has any sort of special significance to me... but I would be lying if I didn't admit that it was my favorite color.

condition.saying: So, Lucina… are you at all interested in women? A friend wants to know.

case.state: W-w-what? I-interested in women? What business does your friend have in asking a personal question like that?
Step on them? That sounds painful. Why would anybody want me to do something like that?
I... doubt that, Dust. As far as I know, we've never met.
Hmmm... Well... when you live your life as a warrior while on the march, you can't really afford to skimp on essentials.
Oh... uh, yes, Estelle. This is my underwear.
(Oh dear... this is more awkward than I anticipated.)
Well... the mask was due to me attempting to keep my influence on the timeline as minimal as possible... oh, I suppose that itself needs an explanation.
That may be so Miko, but I intend to keep it nearby regardless... just in case.
It's... oddly more exciting than normal to do this, Miko.
Nami, my sword is a treasured family heirloom, and I will not easily part from it.
Nami... I've been in life or death situations fighting against overwhelming odds... this is more about pride than anything.
I have my Father's training to thank for that. You're a force to be reckoned with yourself, you know?
Ah... you're not still upset about that loss, are you? Me sending you into an early free fall did seem to swing the match in my favor.
Oh, about the mask, Rinkah... you're not wrong that the Hero King never wore one.
Huh? That sounds just like my cousin, Owain. He has a brand in his... You don't suppose he's been using an alias, like I was earlier?
Retainers of foreign royalty from another world? How could they possibly know about me then?
They sound like interesting people, I'd... one moment, this is a bit difficult to undo... Anyway, what was I saying? Oh! Yes, I would like to meet them sometime.
I'm starting to be convinced this Selena is the Severa I know... she wore a bodysuit underneath her outfit much like my own.
Well... we clearly come from different cultures. I suppose I'll be living like a princess of the Flame Tribe today.
I'm fine with facing down undead warriors, but I'm really starting to lose here. It's only natural things are going to get more tense.
Favorite... character? You must be confused. I can assure you that the Hero King was a real person, we have extensive historical records documenting his life.
Anime dress up? I have no idea what that is. No, this is how I normally dress. It's functional, stylish, and inspires hope in the army I help lead.
Yes, my sword is real, I can assure you of... Wait, are you saying that swords aren't legal in the world you hail from? How curious.
I'm afraid this face reveal might... disappoint you, Weiss.
I'll try to, yes. It was rather... awkward, to say the least. Maybe the mask disguise isn't such a good idea after all.
Don't take it personally, Weiss. It's fairly normal for me to disguise myself like that when traveling to unfamiliar locations.
I think I can manage by myself, Catria, but I do appreciate your offer.
Pit, as much as I appreciate the offer, I doubt Father would approve of you helping to divest me of my bodysuit. Even if you are an angel.
(I hope she's just being playful. The last thing I need is the disdain of a Goddess...)
And I'd rather be judged by the Goddess in my most modest state. As myself, not the hero I strive to be.
Jokes...? Perhaps you could share them with me at some point.
I'll admit my bodysuit is not suited for this warm weather. We normally traverse through the cold, even when in the deserts of Plegia, where it's best to move at night
Last time I was at a Hotrealm, I had heard that they had a nudist beach. Still odd that they would divide a beach like that.
Apologies for concealing my identity. I never know who I may encounter when traveling outrealm, caution is prudent.
I'm aware my identity isn't the best kept secret, but I did manage to trick my Father.
My mask is modeled after a butterfly, a rare creature that symbolizes hope where I am from.
What a shame, my sister tells me that I look heroic in this cape.
I'm actually far more nimble without my cape, but I've been told that it inspires the troops around me.
My outfit was designed to replicate what the Hero King wore generations ago. We had no records of a cape, but my cousin insisted on it’s inclusion.
Right, the next thing to remove should be my boots. My feet have been starting to ache.
When you walk for miles on end, it can be easy to start neglecting your body. I promised I'd start taking better care of myself.
"If ya don't know when ta quit en rest, ya might be stuck on yer keester the next day."
Forgive me if I'm a little wary. It's not uncommon for us to be ambushed at night.
Supposedly people wearing gloves have something to hide, but I simply wear them to better handle my blade.
My ally Inigo seems to think that I need protective gloves to preserve the beauty of my hands...
My gloves are getting somewhat worn out. Perhaps I should get a new pair when I next go to the market with Mother.
Excuse me if this takes a moment, there are quite a few things I need to remove.
Marth was actually my ancestor, but I'll spare all of you the lineage. It's rather convoluted.
This is the last piece of my Marth ensemble...It's always a bittersweet feeling taking it off.
I'm not really sure how Marth would have approached this situation... or if he would have approached it at all..
Everyone changes by themselves in their own tent, well, besides the couples... Needless to say, this is unusual for me.
I really only get to remove this bodysuit when I'm off duty. Sometimes I even sleep in it.
Am I to sulk while the competition is still going so strongly? That would hardly be appropriate.
I don't usually have fun when I'm losing. It's been nice to simply enjoy something for what it is. without worrying about the details.
When I first experienced the deserts of Plegia, it was not uncommon for me to train shirtless.
There's advantages to having a rather small bosom, such as being able to fit into armor without tight undergarments.
I may not dress in feminine garb, but I still have all of the attributes of a woman.
Not fooling anyone? But... I thought I was playing the role pretty well today.
I'm not sure what you mean, Shamir. This is Falchion, the same sword wielded by Marth himself, is it not? Sure, it's been reforged, but...
Parallel Falchion? You know about the failed Rite of Awakening? How?
Lucina? It seems you know quite a bit about me, stranger. How did you come by this information?
Really? But it worked on my Father... Ah! You knew who I was this whole time, didn't you?
Wait, you already know my name? Did some allies of yours tell you of their meeting with me in Askr?
Well... if you two are already naked, I suppose that's a good enough excuse. Just don't tell Father, OK?
Wait, what? No! Catria, I'm a woman and my name is Lucina. I'm not really... wait, are you even listening? Hello?
I-I'm not actually prince Marth, Just who are you fantasizing about, Catria?

condition.saying: Oh, no need to be ashamed, Lucina. There are Pegasus Knights in Macedonia that wear even less than that as uniform...

case.state: Catria, the difference between me and them is that this is my underwear, not my uniform.
Huh? There are pegasus knights where you come from that wear less than this as their uniform? Do they even have any armor at all?

condition.saying: Wait! You are really that flat? How can someone even smaller than me be so popular?

case.state: Huh? A-are you saying that I'm popular? With whom? And... why?
I'm... I'm popular? Wait, what does my... lack of size have anything to do with popularity?

condition.saying: What? So that wasn't some special breast binding technique after all? No wonder I mistook you for a guy...

case.state: It has it's benefits. Hiding the fact that I'm a woman might have been a tad too easy...
Due to... highly unusual circumstances back in my own world, I felt it best to hide my identity as a princess. It's become a bit of a habit when traveling.
W-wait? You know my real name? Mmmm... it seems we really have met in the past and I must have forgotten about it. My apologies.
Y-yes, it seems quite a few awkward things have been said. Uhh... sorry?
Honestly, I'm surprised you didn't figure it out until just now...
I... uh... thanks Catria, I guess?
Casual wear? I mean, I'm quite happy wearing this in my own quarters, but the castle maids insist that it isn't proper in the presence of others.
Fancy? I wouldn't really say that... although it is rather comfortable to wear.
Lingerie? No... this is a modest undergarment with an emphasis on being practical and comfortable... not some showy under-thing.
W-what? No... you've got it all wrong... I mean, yes... it's to disguise the fact that I am royalty, but not like how you are thinking.
It's... difficult to explain. Suffice to say, by being "Marth", I can better focus on my mission while in a world I do not belong in.
... How can you say that when your choice in underwear is apparently nothing but a pair of skimpy knickers?
Yes... To be blunt, this game has not exactly gone as I had envisioned it.
Megumin, are you saying that princesses disguising themselves is becoming a trend... and you've met another one prior to me?
Ah... Ping, that's a long story. Perhaps I could explain why I chose to disguise myself like that later?
I do admit that the odds of multiple women coming here disguised as men does seem rather low, I've personally never met another until just now.
It's fine, Pit. Losing is my responsibility. Please, enjoy your win.
Me? Hate you? Pit... However this game ends, I'm still happy to have you as my friend.
Are you saying you're distracted without any of your clothing? Careful, Pit. I might take advantage of that.
Oh Gods, you're right! He'd hack you up, pummel you, and spike you so hard you'd never come back!
Oh Gods, you're right! If he knew what you did in front of me, you'd probably never fly again even with Lady Palutena's blessing!
Same here... my father would be rather... displeased if he found out what has occurred tonight.
I... I can't believe I'm saying this, b-but if it helps you out, I won't mind. You are a valued friend, after all...
I... can't say I'm aware of any such laws. There are multiple non-royals in the Shepherds led by my Father who wear capes without issue.
To the best of my knowledge, no such law exists in my nation. Anyone is welcome to wear a cape, as long as they can afford one.
What a strange rule Fodlan has. In Ylisse, anyone is welcome to wear a cape, if they desire. I personally know several commoners who wear them as a part of their regular outfit.
I know when to surrender, Weiss, and now is not the time. If I wish to win, this is simply what I must do.
Weiss! I'm already losing. You don't need to be such a poor sport.

condition.saying: L-Lucina? ... Was taking ~player~ away from me not enough for you?

case.state: Take... away... ~player~? I honestly have no idea what you are talking about, I just met ~player~ mere moments ago. Do you two know each other somehow?
...Huh? Tharja? What's gotten into you? You're treating me like I'm suddenly your enemy.
Don't you think you are being a bit overdramatic about this?
I am unsure of why my gender matters so much to you, but I look forward to playing this game with you as well.
I... I come from my world's future, and as someone who has no place in the past, I wore it to... minimize my involvement with those I care about.
Fantasy setting? I'm not quite sure what you mean by that... but I can tell you that I do come from a different world than the one you live in.

condition.saying: I think it was... Some guy who kept trying to hit on me... Laslow?

case.state: Some guy that was hitting on you? I happen to be friends with a notorious flirt named Inigo, but I've never heard him call himself Laslow before.

condition.saying: I think it was... some bratty redhead... What was her name? Selena?

case.state: I happen to be very close friends with a red headed girl named Severa. She does have a rather sharp tongue... could you possibly have just gotten her name mixed up?

condition.saying: What was his name? The guy who was always shouting... Odin?

case.state: Well, I happen to have a cousin named Owain who can be rather... theatrical. He's always making up stories and yelling and the like.
I'm not sure why you'd slander me like that, Lady Palutena. I'm simply here to unwind like everyone else here.
I fail to see how simply following the rules of the game makes me a pervert. You're doing the same, are you not?
I would have to remove my bodysuit in order to show my arms... and for the time being, have no intention of doing that!
While I do appreciate the offer, I need to keep it close by... just in case.
Awww... you like them too? They're designed to be practical, but there's something about their look I am attached to.
Aww... thanks Lady Palutena, you're the best.
You know what? I am. I don't think I would have ever played something like this before meeting people like you.
Anna... is dead? Wait! Which Anna are you referring to? I've met several while traveling the Outrealms...
Ah, thanks. I'd like to think that I make quite the actress while being "Marth".
Thanks, and it's truly a honor to meet an obviously skilled warrior such as yourself as well.
Oh? If you must know, the Exalt of Ylisse comes close to being an absolute monarchy, but even royalty is bound by the covenant made with the Divine Dragon, Naga.
Yes, I am a princess of the proud nation of Ylisse. My father is the Exalt.
I'm not sure what this Legend you are talking about it... but I have fought against a princess named Zelda who used magic to disguise herself as a male warrior.
It's fine Estelle, no offense taken.
Yes, I am indeed a princess. My apologies for the deception.
Yes... My world was set to ruin by the Fell Dragon Grima and his army of monstrosities. Has yours suffered a similar fate as well?
You flatter me, L'Arachel.
Me? A legendary hero? I doubt I can truly live up to the moniker, but I do aspire to follow in the ways of the Hero King Marth.
A... giant sock? Well, I suppose the comparison is rather apt, now that you mention it. It's not really supposed to be worn by itself...
Immodest? How so? My sister told me that my choice in underwear was considerably more chaste than what most women wear.
I appreciate the sentiment, L'Arachel. But it really isn't that much of an issue.
Yes... Truth be told, I don't think my disguise would work if I had a large bust.
Oh? Actually... yes. Lucy just so happens to be my sister's favorite nickname for me.
I see no reason to assume Falchion is the lesser blade. We could put your theory to the test in a mock battle after the game ends, if you wish.
Another thing we have in common, I guess. If our busts were larger, I doubt our disguises would have worked.
Oh? Misato, if you don't mind me asking, what are bodysuits like in the world you come from?
You all have nothing to fear from me, Nami, unless you give me a reason to use my blade. My goal is to protect people, not harm them.
I sometimes get the feeling that the person I like might be more interested in women with more... generously sized proportions.
Oh, my gloves? They're just like that to be fashionable...
You misunderstand. My armor is merely a recreation based on historical records. His outfit was lost sometime over 1,000 years ago.
...Yes, this is my underwear. I hail from a land called Ylisse. You've probably never heard of it, I doubt we are even from the same world.
It's nice to see you too, Pit. It's been a while since we last faced each other... although this does seem to be a... different form of competition.
What? I'm not sure what you mean, Pit. I'm still fully dressed, am I not?
Oh, my apologies, I've been told that most jokes fly right over my head...Er, was that a poor choice of words?
Thank you, Pit. I appreciate the sentiment, truly.
I still have many ways to improve... But thank you, Pit. You've always been sweet, even in the midst of fierce competition.
If he has a mark like mine, we must be related. It's unique to our bloodline.
Arthur... I remember my sister mentioning wanting to start a hero association with a man of that name while we were all in Askr!
Well, if you ever get the chance, I'd love for you to properly introduce them to me.
(I might need to avoid future loses. I'm not sure if I can compare to Rinkah's abs...)
That's got to be Severa, I'm sure of it now! She's always had a bit of a complex about her bust... I think it runs in her family.
That... does rather sound like the Princess Camila I've met. For being royalty... her outfit is rather scandalous.
Nerds? I can't say I'm familiar with the term. Would you care to explain its meaning to me?
Well... if nothing else, this means I had a pretty effective disguise, yes? Anyway, it's in the past now, we need not speak more of this.
(Is... she saying I'm not cute? Is this why he hasn't... )
Falchion was something I inherited from him... when he died... But no use dwelling on that now that we are reunited. Still, he shouldn't know about this.
Rumors? What ever for? You were merely offering to help me undress.
That... seems like a rather misguided form of worship. Is that really what some people are praying for?
It isn't as cute as my actual swimsuit, but I guess my underwear will work well enough.
That bed is starting to look quite comfortable.
He's an odd one, but I can scarcely imagine anyone who can match his knowledge on folklore.
Morale is a precious commodity in my world. If donning a cape truly helps my allies, I have no reason to complain.
Feeling it's weight reminds me of all the lives that depend on me... I confess there is a sense of relief when I remove it.
That was until a rather disgruntled mother told me not to. Apparently that's considered indecent in this time period.
My friend gave it to me, saying he didn't need it anymore. It's served its purpose, but I can't bring myself to get rid of it.
Gods, he really does make his lectures memorable. I hope Brady is taking care of himself back home.
Oh! Surely they must sell clothing here, yes? I wonder if I can find a worthy memento, perhaps something with a card pattern on it?
Can you believe the priorities on that one? He even cracks jokes when he gets injured in battle. I almost wish I could comprehend it.
I hope I still look like a capable leader just as I am... I don't have any great feats or legends to call my own.
I'm unsure if someone like me should even be playing this game. Forgive me if I've burdened you all.
Perhaps proper introductions are in order. My true name is Lucina, Princess of Ylisse.
Masquerading as Marth is rather nostalgic. Still, in the interest of going forward, you should know me as Lucina.
There are no guarantees of victory in war… nor in poker, it would seem. Let us carry on.
Hmm... I suppose this means I'll be settling down for the day. I should find a place to rest.
It feels somewhat strange, staying half dressed like this. Let's keep up the pace.
Good, my grip on Falchion remains firm.
I look forward to the day when I can finally let my guard down for good.
I'm impressed you've pushed me this far. I wasn't expecting to play for this long.
Lets get on with the game, shall we? I believe this is the part where things are supposed to get exciting.
It's... rather nice though. I wouldn't mind doing this more often.
Look at me, prattling on about my evenings. This game is about the present, is it not? Let's enjoy it.
~Player~, it's a little embarassing when you stare at my chest like that. I know I'm in good shape, but I'm not here to show off.
Walking around like this, I'm starting to see why Vaike is so confident.
It's becoming more common for Smash contenders to fight without any sort of top. Do you think I could pull it off, ~player~?
This is what you came here for, is it not, ~player~?
Here I stand, with nothing but the skin on my back. It's all instinct from here!
From here on out, I have no extra chances to rely on. Prepare to face me at my best, ~winner~!
I'm unsure why, but you remind me of a tactician I know back in my world. He is... very important to me.
The fact that he can talk is news to me too. I don't think I've ever heard him speak a word up until now...
Link may be a man of few words, but I can assure you that he is a very kind hearted and heroic young man. I'd be able to depend on him on the battlefield.
... Was it just me, or did we just hear Link say intelligible words?
(Yusuke reminds me a lot of Father, only more... stiff? It must be coincidence. Father entrusted me to travel alone...)
(His voice is a bit deeper, but I can definitely hear a resemblance.)
(Okay...Okay. I simply have to ask him a question. That should clear things up.)
Seriously, Father? I find it offensive that you'd dress as a strange man just to keep an eye on me!
I pray you can forgive me, Yusuke. I imagine that wasn't just embarrassing for me...
My hair color? It's been a common color within the royal family for countless generations. ... There are much rarer colors in my world.
A point against the Captain.
Captain, I can't say I'm sorry to see you lose.
ahem, You'll get no sympathy from me, Captain.
Wait... Florina, you don't want ~name~ here? That's not a very nice thing to say to someone you just met...
Florina, why do you appear so worried? You do know you're not the one who has to strip, yes?
If I understand the rules right, this means you need to take a piece of clothing off.
I'm sorry, but from what I was told about how things work here, you'll need to remove an article.
Well, it seems I'm off to a good start here.
I know it's only the first round, but this game's result is already looking promising for me.
I'd say we've all earned this victory against, ~name~. What's he going to give us for it?
I await your decision, ~name~, whatever it may be.
No need to look so downtrodden, ~name~. We all played with the same rules.
I shouldn't laugh, but ~name~'s reaction is just so endearing!
Rise up, ~name~. I know you can do better!
Well, you lost ~name~. You know what you must do now, correct?
I might have tried a little to hard there. Apologies, ~name~.
Father... I won!
Considering my cornered state, you should have exercised more caution, ~name~.
Father... I won!. Actually, please don't tell him a word about this, okay?
Don't take it too hard, I've lost my fair share of rounds and I'm still standing!
There we are! Another round secured. At this rate I might be able to turn this game around!
~Name~? You're not losing focus are you? I need you to be at your best!
The competition is only going to get more fierce, how will you adapt, ~name~?
Don't take me lightly just because I'm out of my armor, ~name~!
I intend to rewrite history, ~name~. Besting you is trivial by comparison!
So, are you going to give me something more to work with here?
Oh, well, this should be interesting,
Could you make this something special I won't forget, ~name~? I've got a long road ahead...
The only time we see men undress is after battle, and this usually isn't what's on my mind...
If you ever wanted to impress a princess, ~name~, now's your chance...
It's normally bad...hah... form to root for someone's defeat... But today's hardly a normal day for me.
I'm not even going at full speed, ~name~... Think you can give me some motivation?
Go on, ~name~. I'm sure it'll be great...
You have the chance to make an impact on me, ~name~...
You got to see a princess strip herself naked, now it's time that you return the favor.
Ah, it seems you lost ~name~. Show us something good, OK?
Keep this up and you'll be joining me in the losers club before you know it.
I think I'm starting to see the benefits of just sitting back and being a spectator...
It's you're turn now ~name~. Show us something interesting.
You're not getting away, ~name~. Not after seeing the things you've seen!
Come, ~name~. You've been clothed long enough.
Whatever it takes... I will win this game.
I don't think you're quite ready to stand up to the Hero King, ~name~, but I commend your courage.
I do not find you any less capable as a result of this defeat, ~name~.
How does someone like~name~ handle defeat, I wonder?
A loss for ~name~, and not a single scratch on me.
Maybe this is an bad time to mention this, but for some reason you remind me of my dear friend Robin. Curious...
I too am glad that I have had the chance to meet you two. It always gives me hope seeing a strong duo.
Lyndis, is this really how you treat your friend? Surely she deserved to know about this...
Wait, is lady Catria famous? This is the first I've heard of her.
Has the Order of Underwear Knights already have to be disbanded? I thought it was a cute idea...
So long Order of Underwear Knights, your cuteness shall be dearly missed.
Wait, you're not going to run away again, are you?
Florina... I had hoped that we were past this by now.
Come now Florina, Pegasus Knights don't run from danger, remember?
Oh! Florina, you know Ninian? I must say I agree, her outfit resembles Ninian's dress a great deal.
Ninian? I met a girl in Askr who went by that name, she was a dancer of much grace and beauty.
I... don't really understand Moon either. She's a strange girl... and that's putting it very lightly.
This game has got to be rigged, nobody could lose this many times in a row, right?
If you don't want to remove your breastplate, I'm sure you can find something else to substitute it.
Last time someone tried to use a snapshot tome this way, people got very upset. Are you sure you can be doing this, Streaming-chan?
That's a real shame, you looked so cute in that spring outfit.
Well Florina, you may have lost this round, but at least you had a good run while down to your underwear.
Florina, I know it's scary, but I believe you can do it! We'll be back to being dressed in no time, promise!
Sorry Florina, it looks like you'll be joining me in the no-top club. You'll be back to being dressed in no time, promise!
Yes, I hate to say it but Florina has little chance of winning at this point. Surely we can let her simply forfeit, yes?
"Like"? No Florina, Lady Palutena is much more than just "like" a goddess...
Florina, h-how do you keep losing like this?
Errr... could we give Florina a mulligan, just this once?
Oh dear... Florina's undergarments didn't even stand a chance...
Yes, it would certainly appear you've experienced a bit of bad luck.
I don't know, I think undressing with the men isn't that bad. It's actually a good opportunity to strike up conversation.
You don't have anything on underneath that leotard, do you?
Wait, what? No, it wasn't! I swear it Florina, I know of no such plot.
Well, it looks like that bunnysuit is finally meeting its end...
A bee? Stay away from her, foul insect!
Relax Florina, you've got a whole lot left to remove before you starting worrying about being nude.
Florina, if you win you might not join us... and at this rate I'd say your odds are looking pretty solid.
Oh no! You lost already... *sigh* Florina, I really do feel sorry for you right now.
I'm sorry Florina, but I think it's fair that you join us in removing something. It isn't that bad. Honest.
Oh dear... even though I want to win, I had been hoping you would be able to wear your underwear at least a bit longer than that...
Florina, are you afraid of men or... wait, what are you doing?
(Didn't mother tell me not to show too much skin around men I didn't know? I don't see what the issue is?)
Hmmm... it seems this game pulls no punches when it comes to punishing the losers.
I... I hate to say this, but yes, you do Florina.
It looks like yet another hero will be losing the entirety of their clothing.
I suppose you've never met him, but you've already gotten this far in front of him, and he hasn't acted too out of line. If he does, he'll have to answer to me.
I suppose that works. Think of it as a way to show that you aren't afraid of men like you say you used to be.

condition.saying: I haven't even undressed once and yet you all have more clothes

case.state: Wait, you don't have 8 articles of clothing to remove? That hardly seems fair...

condition.saying: The rule that the player in lead has to strip two things is made up by Princess Minerva

case.state: I can't recall any rule like that being stated before we began this game. It seems this princess of yours plays by some... unorthodox rules.
B-b-bee! The bee is back! Wait... Florina, watch out!
Again? How does that thing keep coming back when it's your turn? It's like it knows things that shouldn't be possible for a bee to know!
I'm sorry, Florina, but in the interest of being fair I really can't hold back... even if I am against you.

condition.saying: I wanted to keep it for someone special...

case.state: Not to pry, just may I ask just who that may be? No pressure, of course.
That's the spirit! Show us what you've got.

condition.saying: Um, I'd rather keep my dress on, th-thanks.

case.state: Florina, I hate to say this, but unless you quit, keeping your dress on simply isn't an option.

condition.saying: Aww... I was so happy being the only one still in her panties.

case.state: This game is coming down to sudden death... Good!
(Now that she mentions it, is this really the type of game a princess should be playing?)
I for one would have no problem with letting you keep them on, but unless the others here can agree to that as well... I'm afraid they likely have to go.
Sorry Florina, but the rules here do seem pretty clear about how this game is supposed to work.
Nayru! Behind you! ... Oh Naga, it's too late.
What manner of foul sorcery is this?!?
Still as gracious in defeat as ever, Lady Palutena... Well, except for when you lost to the Hero...
There's the confidence of the Goddess that us mortals all aspire to. Even if she is a little crass.
Oh dear. If this keeps up, People might start questioning your Godhood, Lady Palutena.
Lady Palutena lost again? And here I was at the begining of the match thinking I had no chance of beating her...
How ironic that a goddess and a human are in the same predicament.
Lady Palutena, you may be falling a bit behind, but I still believe in you. You are a genuine Goddess, after all.
Removing the crown from a Goddess would be too much... So that just leaves...
Transparency? You can do that? Oh... sorry, bad timing.
If a mortal like me can do this, surely a Goddess like yourself can manage too, yes?
Florina, it's only a game of cards. Why are you fidgeting so much over a loss?
Well, it's your turn again Florina. Maybe you should try your gloves next?
You've still got a few good options left Florina, I'm sure you'll find something you can safely part with.
Good job Florina, I see you've already become a braver person.
Sorry about this Florina... at least you still have a dress on underneath your tunic?
(Seeing Florina like this hurts to watch... that poor girl.)
I don't know what to say Florina... sigh do your best to stay strong.
Florina, you don't need to panic. Remember, it's just one article of clothing, alright?
Sorry Catria, but it's only fair you joined us in removing something.
Come, Catria! It's quite comfortable, I promise you!
If a princess like me can go topless, I'm sure you can too. It's really not that embarrassing.
(Time for the moment of truth, will she be brave enough to do it?)
Well Florina, it looks like you'll be joining the rest of us in shedding our clothes. I almost thought for a minute that you might not have to...
It looks like you are back to normal? How curious, even with all my time spent exploring the Outrealms I still run into all sorts of enigma such as yourself.
A warp spell? Who is this?
Princess Minerva? Interesting... a friend of mine rides a wyvern with that name.
I agree, it's definitely ~name~'s turn to strip.
Keep it up Florina, I know you can do it!
If this was a more traditional battle, I'm fairly confident that I would have good odds of coming out on top. If anyone would like to spar with me, I'm up for the challenge.
I don't know what everyone else's desired position is, but I prefer to be right in the thick of it, surronded by enemies! I must lead by example for my troops.
W-wha? Sweat? I don't even think the shadiest members of the Anna family would purchase sweat.
Well, it seems I'm off to a good start here.
I know it's only the first round, but this game's result is already looking promising for me.
If I understand the rules right, this means you need to take a piece of clothing off. Please feel free to start slowly.
I'm sorry ~name~, but from what I was told about how things work here, you'll need to remove an article.
Keep this up and you might find yourself right alongside me...
The thought of ~name~ stripping didn't excite me untill now...
Just remember what's at stake, ~name~. Think you can handle it?
You're not going to retreat now, are you, ~name~?
If this is what they consider "bad", than what you must do is simple by comparison.
I'm feeling a little thirsty, ~name~. Think you can get me something to drink?
I'm not normally that interested... but then again, is anything normal about this?
I think we might make for a good team, ~name~... Want to keep losing to find out?
I was a bit worried about making ~name~ lose at first... But now that I've lost, I still want her to lose... It's strange.
Part of me thinks you wanted to lose, even if only a little, ~name~.
You're still in the game. That alone is an achievement, ~name~.
I know this seems most unfortunate, but you should be thankful you still have something to remove.
Did you lose on purpose, ~name~? I wouldn't blame you if you did...
If you're going to lose, make it something they won't forget!
If you fall, ~name~, I'll be there to catch you. Keep going!
The only skill that's important in this game, is how well you handle your loses, ~name~.
Not bad, ~name~. But you need to do better to compete with me.
If I can keep this up, I'll win this game for sure.
I pray my enigmatic nature isn't a cause of stress for you, ~name~. Beneath this mask, you might find we have a fair bit in common.
( ~name~ is eyeing me. I wonder if she can see through my disguise?)
Rather unlucky isn't it? I assure you, I did not win this hand through skill.
It would seem you lost this round, ~name~.
Please consider your options carefully ~name~.
I'm really sorry ~name~, but if I'm going to win that means you need to lose.
Father... I won!
My victory over ~name~ feels a little hollow. I didn't really do anything.
Normally I give feedback to my bested rivals, but I'm just as lost as you are here, ~name~.
For me to stay in this game, that means someone else must fall... It brings back unpleasant memories.
It would seem you lost this round, ~name~. You know what you must do now, right?
Please consider your options carefully ~name~. Well... not too carefully, I do plan on winning after all.
I've endured several losses leading up to this point, and they have only served to bring us closer. You can do this, ~name~.
Yes!
That was incredibly suspenseful... And I loved it!
My apologies, ~name~. This game can be rather embarrassing at times, can't it?
There we are! Another round secured. At this rate I might be able to turn this game around!
A tie? Perhaps some sort of duel could determine the winner? No...That'd be a bit excessive.
Aha! Finally, I can see his face! I'll never forget this!
That thing certainly is an... interesting contraption. You say it can summon monsters? I've never seen anything like it before!
Watch it! You could have killed someone with that!
Whatever surprise tactic you're employing , ~name~... it's working. I completely forgot about your ~clothing~.
Um... did you forget you had this or...
Y-you still had this little thing and yet you... I don't understand.
Sigh ...Not giving me much to work with, are you.
So what will you be removing? How about your... oh. Well, that works too, I guess...
I...um. I mean, it's not against the rules...
Oh... right. We're playing a game where winning is important...
I mean... At least there are other things to look at here, I suppose. Right...?
It's like to confess to someone, only to have them reject you...You um... Don't see that often...
We're well past the early game at this point, ~name~.
I managed to lose it all and yet you still have accessories? It's clear that I was outmatched from the beginning.
Let's find a new way to compete after the game alright, ~name~? I want to find a place where I can beat you!
It takes a certain amount of bravery to be boring at a time like this. I'll give you that.
That's a fine choice, ~name~. That said, it doesn't put you in any position to make requests.
There is nothing wrong with removing your ~clothing~, good choice.
Ah, so you've chosen to remove your ~clothing~? Can't say I blame you, ~name~.
Good choice, there is no need to rush things.
Just removing something small like your ~clothing~ seems like a good strategy.
Considering the fact that I'm wearing a mask, I cannot fault you for keeping a low profile.
(I wonder how he would go about playing this game?)
Prioritizing your own survival instead of showing off... I respect it, ~name~.
Right... Seems simple enough.
There's no need to go fast, ~name~. This is your leisure time, correct?
Planning ahead are we, ~name~? I wish you the best!
(~name~ seems fairly carefree. I wish I could afford to be like that from time to time.)
... Hm? Oh, forgive me, ~name~. I was thinking about... Well, nothing you need to worry yourself about.
To be entirely honest, I'm a bit disappointed.
That's surprisingly cautious of you, ~name~. I haven't rattled you in some way, have I?
I might have gotten a little eager. I forgot ~name~ had his ~clothing~.
Still standing strong, ~name~? It's impressive but...
Are you really trying to taunt me, or are you simply trying to motivating me, ~name~? Take caution either way!
I wouldn't want you to be going easy on me now, ~name~, even if I do think you could handle your losses with a bit more flourish.
I can't believe how closely I'm watching you remove your ~clothing~, ~name~! It's ridiculous!
Florina, I'm pretty sure he's been able to see you this entire time...
So that's what you look like... Not so impressive now, are you?
He only removed his ~clothing~ and yet you started panicking? Are you aware of what game you are playing?
There's no need to get so worked up over something small like that Florina.
Florina, do you get nervous around men? It's funny, I know a know a man with a similar issue... (What would happen if they met?)
If you don't mind me asking, what exactly are those things you removed from your head?
If the others complain, feel free to ignore them.
Now that that's over, let's continue playing.
Well, that's one less barrier between me and victory... let's begin the next round!
You're safe for now, but how many small items do you have remaining?
(Perhaps I shouldn't stay too long. There are people like ~name~ who need protecting.)
Let's get to know each other more over the course of the game. Okay, ~name~?
You can't hide behind little things like that forever.
I don't suppose you could be a bit more ambitious next time?
Come now. Surely you can be a bit more adventurous.
Don't think for a second that I'm letting that be the last thing you remove.
Is there any way I can convince you to forfeit the rest of your clothing, ~name~? I need to brush up my diplomacy.
If you wish to earn my respect, you'll have to display a bit more courage, ~name~.
Would you care to train with me, ~name~? I'll only accept your challenge if you strip to my level, of course.
I'm not sure why, but I had expected better of you than this.
( I guess I'm not very appealing to ~name~...)
If I'm going to do this in front of you, I'd rather not be reduced to using my imagination, ~name~.
I thought there was something special about this moment, but I suppose that was a selfish expectation.
I don't take kindly to taunts, ~name~.
I guess I'll just stick to my fantasies...
If I wasn't already out of the game I'd probably be a bit upset about this.
You didn't just come here to leer at naked women while protecting yourself with cheap tricks, did you?
You're running on borrowed time, ~name~. Best end the game quick if you want to avoid slipping.
(Patience, Lucina. It's gotten you this far...)
(I've slain hoards of risen, yet I couldn't even get ~name~ out of his ~clothing~?)
I won't berate you for your choice ~name~... But that doesn't mean I'll stop the others from doing it.
Now that that's over, let us continue playing.
A good man never reveals his character too early... right, ~name~?
Come to think of it, why is it allowed for some players of this game to have more articles than others? Surely that isn't very fair...
Oh... so you think that guns beat swords, do you? I'll have you know I've taken on opponents wielding firearms, and honestly I don't see it.
You want to put your theory to practice, Revy? All I would need to do is close the distance, and you'd be bested.

condition.saying: I-is it okay to start with my sword, Prince Marth?

case.state: I... uh... your sword is a perfectly fine choice. (Why does this girl care so much about my opinion?)
Remove whatever you like. There are no rules to determine order, just common sense.
Akko! I... what have you... Stand back everyone, I'll see if I can stop her!
Wait— Florina?! Where are you going? It's ust a game!
Gods, I didn't think someone could run that fast in armor!
Umm... should I go see if she requires help?
Ah! You had me fooled there for a second, Zoey.
Ah! So bright! ... Wait, where did you come from? What is this trickery?
Don't worry Catria, though you are now bereft of your sword, I swear by the sacred blade Falchion I will do my utmost to protect you from harm.
Have no fear, though you may be currently unarmed, you can rely on me to protect you.
You seem nervous. I understand your feelings, I wouldn't feel comfortable without my sword either.
It's just a little length of leather, I'm sure you'll be able to manage this.
Ah, I knew something seemed... off about you. This is your true form, is it not?
What are you... ah, I see you had a secret weapon in reserve. Clever.

~player~, can I challenge you to another figh… I mean, game, sometime in the future? I still have much to learn.
Do you mind if I… ask you to invite me to another one of these games in the future?
A little respite is nice every so often... In fact, in the end, it's these types of enjoyable moments that I'm fighting for.
I've heard there's a great hot spring just the next Outrealm over. It's mixed gender, but I don't think that should be a problem, right?
So... are there any other variations of this game? Perhaps something like "Strip Dueling" or "Strip Cooking"?
I'm getting a little hungry... for food. That wasn't meant to sound like a flirt.
I don't mind standing, but if there was a crate or something I could sit on... I wouldn't turn it down.
Take your time. I've dropped my plans for the rest of the day.
Perhaps one day I'll be able to actually play games like this on a daily basis... I can hope at least.
If I can get my sword practice in soon, I'll be free for the rest of the day. Is there a training ground here?
Ending up here seemed like such a mishap at first... But I suppose mishaps can lead to great discovery!
Indeed, I'm afraid my face will have to remain an enigma for the time being. Farewell everyone!
It's a deal. I for one have no intention of mentioning what has happened here to anyone... let alone my father.
Well, that was certainly an... interesting experience. At least I won?
You all seemed to enjoy yourselves at least. I suppose it's time for me to hit the road.
A clear victory for the princess of Ylisse!
That was fun... but, I must be going. I spent a bit too much time here.
Maybe I'm not so bad at this poker game after all!
This was a tough battle, but a worthwhile one!
I guess I should put my clothes back on now. I was... just starting to get comfortable, too.
I meant it when I said I was going to win! None of you stood a chance!
Well played everyone! Now, shall we all get something to eat?
Wow! Congratulations on the win Catria, you crushed all of us. Maybe we could rematch some time?
Congratulations on the win Catria, that was a hard-fought battle up until the very end.
Congratulations on your victory Florina, you did amazing for being an amateur at this game.
Congratulations on the win, Florina. I knew you could do it!
I may have lost, but seeing you win puts a smile on my face.
Congratulations on the win, Florina. You had to fight hard even up till the end to pull that victory off.
A flawless victory for Lady Palutena. I expected nothing less from her!
Congratulations on your win, Lady Palutena. It wasn't even close.
Indeed we have. Thank you for gracing us with your presense, Lady Palutena.
Agreed, good game. I had a lot of fun too... want to play again sometime?
Ah yes, fully clothed... I supposed it's about time I got dressed.
Thank you, Lady Palutena. I'd like to think we all played well today.
(For someone who just won the game, Lady Palutena seems oddly upset.)
I suppose I'm past due to redress myself. Mind if I join you, Lady Palutena?
Ah, so this is what the loving hug of the Goddess of Light looks li... wait, Lady Palutena, I think you might be smothering him!
(... A hug from the Goddess... Well, what would be the harm in asking for one myself?)
Well... I may have lost, but I put up a pretty good fight!
That's the game... I think I did pretty well for this being my first time!
W-w-wait... what?!? This is unacceptable! Drop it, Nami. I'll chase you as far as I have to, even without my equipment!
And this is why I kept Falchion so close... Think you can escape, Nami? I'm very fast, especially without my equipment!
Would anyone like to join me in swimming now? I'm sure it will be lots of fun!
Why Pit, I'd love to! I feel like I could use a good soak after... all this. I know a great mixed bath just three Outrealms away, sound good?
You know, all things considered, I think I played a pretty good game of cards.
I may not have quite won this game today, but... how about a rematch some time?
I hope that you'll invite me back in the future. Farewell for now, ~player~.
Well, it seems that game has concluded. Just... make sure my father knows nothing of this.
Well, that... happened. Anyone want to go visit a hot spring with me now? A bath would be the perfect way to cap this off.
I'll be out training in the back. If any of you need anything, please let me know!

scene.name: Intro1
scene.directive: After the game, Lucina and the rest of the players made a visit to the local hot spring.
Lucina greatly enjoyed this chance to simply relax with others, but she knew that she would soon have to return to her own world.

Unsure if she would ever get to see her newly made friend again, Lucina gave you a hug before heading through the Outrealm portal that would transport her back to Ylisse for her final showdown with the Fell Dragon Grima.

scene.name: Intro 2
scene.directive: Lucina and her allies emerged victorious, changing the fate of her previously doomed world.

However, after the climatic battle, when Lucina went to confess her love to the tactician who had led their army to victory, she was devasted to hear that he had already given his heart to a different woman.
Feeling out of place in a world that no longer needed her, Lucina disappeared after whispering these words to her infant self: "Yours will be a happy future.".
Did she journey to another land or back to her own time? No one knows for certain...

scene.name: Hotsprings Outside 1
scene.directive: One and a half years later...

scene.name: Hotsprings Inside 1
scene.directive: As the two of you enter the bathhouse together, you feel yourself quickly beginning to feel more comfortable in the warm, misty air of the hot spring.
While the two of you are surveying your accommodations, you notice that Lucina is acting a bit odd...
Suddenly, she steps in front of you with sudden resolve clearly written on her beautiful face.
Could she possibly be talking about... that?
Suddenly relaxing in the bath is the last thing on your mind.
Having a pretty good idea of where your wife is going with this, you quickly comply with her request.
